On this page

User Management ​

Comprehensive guide for managing users across the platform.

Overview ​

User management capabilities vary by admin level:

  • Super Admin: All users across all organizations
  • Organization Admin: Users within their organization
  • Hall Admin: Limited user support functions

User Roles ​

Role Hierarchy ​

  1. Super Admin - Platform-wide control
  2. Organization Admin - Organization-level control
  3. Hall Admin - Location-level control
  4. User - Standard platform access

Permissions by Role ​

Super Admin:

  • Manage all users
  • Assign any role
  • Access all organizations
  • System configuration

Organization Admin:

  • Manage organization users
  • Assign hall admin roles
  • Organization settings
  • Organization reports

Hall Admin:

  • View location users
  • Assist with user issues
  • Limited user support

User:

  • Report items
  • Submit claims
  • Manage profile
  • Search items

User Operations ​

Create Users ​

Manual Creation:

  1. Navigate to Users → Add User
  2. Fill in user details
  3. Assign role and organization
  4. Set initial password
  5. Send welcome email

Bulk Import:

  1. Prepare CSV file
  2. Upload to system
  3. Map fields
  4. Review and confirm
  5. Send invitations

Edit Users ​

  • Update user information
  • Change email address
  • Reset password
  • Modify role
  • Update organization
  • Change status

Delete Users ​

  • Soft delete (deactivate)
  • Hard delete (permanent)
  • Export user data first
  • Handle data retention
  • Notify if required

User Status ​

Status Types ​

  • Active: Full access
  • Pending: Email not verified
  • Suspended: Temporarily blocked
  • Inactive: Deactivated account
  • Deleted: Permanently removed

Status Management ​

  • Activate pending users
  • Suspend problematic users
  • Reactivate suspended users
  • Delete inactive accounts

Search and Filter ​

Search Options ​

  • Search by name
  • Search by email
  • Search by organization
  • Search by role
  • Search by status

Advanced Filters ​

  • Registration date range
  • Last login date
  • Activity level
  • Item count
  • Claim count

User Analytics ​

User Statistics ​

  • Total users
  • Active users
  • New registrations
  • User growth trends
  • Engagement metrics

User Activity ​

  • Login frequency
  • Items reported
  • Claims submitted
  • Success rates
  • Last activity

Bulk Operations ​

Bulk Actions ​

  • Export user list
  • Send bulk emails
  • Update multiple users
  • Assign roles in bulk
  • Change status in bulk

Import/Export ​

  • Export to CSV/Excel
  • Import from CSV
  • Field mapping
  • Validation
  • Error handling

Security ​

Password Management ​

  • Reset user passwords
  • Enforce password policies
  • Require password changes
  • Monitor password strength

Account Security ​

  • Enable 2FA for users
  • Monitor login attempts
  • Block suspicious activity
  • Review access logs

Communication ​

Email Users ​

  • Send individual emails
  • Bulk email campaigns
  • Notification management
  • Email templates

Announcements ​

  • Platform announcements
  • Organization announcements
  • Targeted messages
  • Scheduled messages

Best Practices ​

  1. Regular Audits: Review user accounts regularly
  2. Security First: Enforce strong security policies
  3. Data Privacy: Respect user privacy
  4. Clear Communication: Keep users informed
  5. Documentation: Maintain user records
  6. Training: Provide user training resources

Effective user management ensures a secure, organized platform with engaged users.
